sqlMap.sql: DANWEIGUID, AUDITSTATUS, STATUSCODE, REMARK, JINCHUKOUQYPINO, JINGYETYPE, GONGYINGSHANGTYPE, ZHUCEJIBIE, LOCALLIANXIREN, LOCALMOBILE, ACCOUNT, BANK, LIANXIREN1, LIANXIREN2, LIANXIREN1EMAIL, LIANXIREN2EMAIL, LIANXIREN1MOBILE, LIANXIREN2MOBLIE, LIANXIREN1TEL, LIANXIREN2TEL, LIANXIREN1FAX, LIANXIREN2FAX, LIANXIREN1ADDRESS, LIANXIREN2ADDRESS, LIANXIREN1ZIP, LIANXIREN2ZIP
sqlMap.select:
select
from HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO where 1=1
AUDITSTATUS=#status#
STATUSCODE=#zcText1#

select
from huiyuan_zfcg_gongyinginfo g where g.danweiguid in (select u.danweiguid from huiyuan_user u where u.userguid = #danweiguid:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.insert: insert into HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO (DANWEIGUID, AUDITSTATUS, STATUSCODE, REMARK, JINCHUKOUQYPINO, JINGYETYPE, GONGYINGSHANGTYPE, ZHUCEJIBIE, LOCALLIANXIREN, LOCALMOBILE, ACCOUNT, BANK, LIANXIREN1, LIANXIREN2, LIANXIREN1EMAIL, LIANXIREN2EMAIL, LIANXIREN1MOBILE, LIANXIREN2MOBLIE, LIANXIREN1TEL, LIANXIREN2TEL, LIANXIREN1FAX, LIANXIREN2FAX, LIANXIREN1ADDRESS, LIANXIREN2ADDRESS, LIANXIREN1ZIP, LIANXIREN2ZIP) values (#danweiguid:VARCHAR#, #auditstatus:VARCHAR#, #statuscode:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #jinchukouqypino:VARCHAR#, #jingyetype:VARCHAR#, #gongyingshangtype:VARCHAR#, #zhucejibie:VARCHAR#, #locallianxiren:VARCHAR#, #localmobile:VARCHAR#, #account:VARCHAR#, #bank:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren1:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren2:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren1email:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren2email:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren1mobile:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren2moblie:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren1tel:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren2tel:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren1fax:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren2fax:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren1address:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren2address:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren1zip:VARCHAR#, #lianxiren2zip:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO set AUDITSTATUS = #auditstatus:VARCHAR#, STATUSCODE = #statuscode:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, JINCHUKOUQYPINO = #jinchukouqypino:VARCHAR#, JINGYETYPE = #jingyetype:VARCHAR#, GONGYINGSHANGTYPE = #gongyingshangtype:VARCHAR#, ZHUCEJIBIE = #zhucejibie:VARCHAR#, LOCALLIANXIREN = #locallianxiren:VARCHAR#, LOCALMOBILE = #localmobile:VARCHAR#, ACCOUNT = #account:VARCHAR#, BANK = #bank:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN1 = #lianxiren1:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN2 = #lianxiren2:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN1EMAIL = #lianxiren1email:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN2EMAIL = #lianxiren2email:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN1MOBILE = #lianxiren1mobile:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN2MOBLIE = #lianxiren2moblie:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN1TEL = #lianxiren1tel:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN2TEL = #lianxiren2tel:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN1FAX = #lianxiren1fax:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN2FAX = #lianxiren2fax:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN1ADDRESS = #lianxiren1address:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN2ADDRESS = #lianxiren2address:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN1ZIP = #lianxiren1zip:VARCHAR#, LIANXIREN2ZIP = #lianxiren2zip:VARCHAR# where DANWEIGUID = #danweiguid:VARCHAR#
update HUIYUAN_ZFCG_GONGYINGINFO set AUDITSTATUS = #auditstatus:VARCHAR# where DANWEIGUID = #danweiguid:VARCHAR#
